description: Variation of condition 2 (Approved Plans) of planning permission Ref PP/2013/ 0353 dated 11/07/13 for construction of three storey (with habitable accommodation in the roof space), seven bedroom detached dwelling with integral basement; and associated parking and landscaping (following demolition of the existing house) (amendment to consist of revision to basement plan)
decision_conditions: 2. The development hereby approved shall be carried out in accordance with drawing title numbers: Location Plan: 01; Block Plan: 1212 02; Existing Plans: 1212 03; Existing Elevations: 1212 04; Existing Context Elevations: 1212 05 Rev A; Proposed Elevations 1212 33 Rev D; Proposed Ground Floor Plan: 1212 06 Rev F; Proposed First Floor Plan: 1212 07 Rev C; Proposed Loft Plan 1212 08 Rev B; Proposed Basement Plan: 1212 09 Revision B; Existing and Proposed Sections: 1212 10; Approved Plans: 1212 13; Approved Elevations: 1212 14; Out Building: 1212 15; Design and Access Statement Rev A, dated December 2012, unless otherwise agreed in writing by the local Planning Authority.  Reason: For the avoidance of doubt, and in the interests of proper planning.
